item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. A $1k Wheelchair (266 points | 104 comments)
2. Is the world really running out of sand? (316 points | 100 comments)
3. A Local-First Case Study (62 points | 30 comments)
4. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (October 2024) (170 points | 157 comments)
5. COBOL has been "dead" for so long, my grandpa wrote about it (82 points | 67 comments)
6. Verdn (YC W22) is hiring software engineers to build next-gen donation APIs ( | hide)
7. Don't build your castle in other people's kingdoms (2021) (27 points | 7 comments)
8. Show HN: A real time AI video agent with under 1 second of latency (202 points | 104 comments)
9. Bots, so many bots (202 points | 235 comments)
10. Launch HN: Quetzal (YC S24) – Stripe for Internationalization (29 points | 16 comments)
11. End the line: The last Sun SPARC workstation [video] (49 points | 22 comments)
12. ESO telescope captures the most detailed infrared map of the Milky Way (217 points | 48 comments)
13. Ask HN: Who wants to be hired? (October 2024) (88 points | 200 comments)
14. Show HN: Sourcebot, an open-source Sourcegraph alternative (91 points | 15 comments)
15. Mullenweg threatens corporate takeover of WP Engine (30 points | 7 comments)

17. OpenAI DevDay 2024 live blog (140 points | 47 comments)
18. Comedy Theory (2022) (224 points | 160 comments)
19. Quake runs in just 276 kB RAM on the Arduino Nano Matter board (98 points | 13 comments)
20. Show HN: Web Scraping with Your Web Browser: Why Not? (18 points | 14 comments)
21. Gorhill pulls uBlock Origin Lite from Firefox store (220 points | 262 comments)
22. Ryujinx (Nintendo Switch emulator) has been removed from GitHub (321 points | 224 comments)
23. The Netherlands has returned some stolen artifacts to Indonesia (141 points | 134 comments)
24. Comparing our Rust-based indexing and querying pipeline to Langchain (85 points | 46 comments)
25. Pro bettors disguising themselves as gambling addicts (152 points | 178 comments)
26. Anthropic hires OpenAI co-founder Durk Kingma (123 points | 53 comments)
27. You Better Shop Around: Litigant Characteristics and Supreme Court Support [pdf] (15 points | 3 comments)
28. Wreck of 'Ghost Ship of the Pacific' Found Off California (14 points | 1 comment)
29. What the photographer who’s taken philosopher portraits thinks of philosophers (51 points | 19 comments)
30. Boris Vallejo and the pixel art of the demoscene (457 points | 111 comments)
